summary: The Sepolia proof-of-work chain merged with its proof-of-stake chain on Wednesday, taking Ethereum one step closer to its own Merge moment.
title: Ethereum's Sepolia Testnet Successfully Switches to Proof-of-Stake
content: The penultimate test environment network (testnet) merge before the Ethereum blockchain makes its long-awaited move to proof-of-stake from proof-of-work has successfully been completed.
Read more: Merge Testing on Ethereum: What Is It and Why Does It Matter?
